TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDependentKeyValueFactory

summary.para: A factory for key values based on the foreign key values taken from various forms of entity data.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information and examples.

MemberSignature.Value: public object? CreateDependentEquatableKey (Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Update.IUpdateEntry entry, bool fromOriginalValues = false);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateDependentEquatableKey(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Update.IUpdateEntry entry, bool fromOriginalValues) cil managed
Public Function CreateDependentEquatableKey (entry As IUpdateEntry, Optional fromOriginalValues As Boolean = false) As Object

Docs.param: The entry tracking an entity instance.
Whether the original or current values should be used.
Docs.summary: Creates an equatable key object from the foreign key values in the given entry.

Docs.param: The entry tracking an entity instance.
